version_description:
Updated database
Fixed various bugs
Optimizations made for 64-bit devices

- Compatibility update for iOS 11
- Various bug fixes
- UI updates

- Graphics fixes for the newest device screens
- Updated station list
- New app icon
- Fixed ability to add favorites on older devices
Now you can read about active events going on at the moment along with the station that is current playing the audio from that event
Updated station list. Various bug fixes.
